com.example.healthtracker.Contollers

Class ViewPageAdapterActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
      • com.example.healthtracker.Contollers.ViewPageAdapterActivity

  • public class ViewPageAdapterActivity
extends android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter
    ViewPageAdapterActivity handles loading the arrayList containing the images to be displayed when a problem's slideshow is desired to be seen. After the array list is loaded each image view is put into a container object to be shown in a slideshow.
    Since:
    2018-11-25
